nodes.bodyText: Sentences start with a capital letter and end with a period.

method is called exists()
you first loop through and see if they exist, then you loop through again and check if they are running.
was wondering why that second loop is there? seemed like maybe it was copy/pasted from another method?

The existing tests check if the pod is getting created but not ready yet and then checks if it is running. If the assertion is only to check if the domain and pods exist (in ready state) then we may not need the podExists check. Removed it.
ok great, was just checking, since it did not seem to match up
